meanings.sent1: One downside of eating too much candy is getting cavities.
meanings.sent2: The downside of missing the bus is having to walk to school.
meanings.sent3: The downside of having a pet hamster is constantly cleaning its cage.
meanings.sent4: The downside of procrastination is the stress of last-minute work.
meanings.sent5: The downside of rainy days is not being able to play outside.

meanings.definition: The lower side or part of something.
meanings.sent1: The downside of the book was worn from frequent use.
meanings.sent2: She placed the vase upside down to examine the downside.
meanings.sent3: The cat explored the downside of the couch, looking for lost toys.
meanings.sent4: The downside of the mountain was covered in lush vegetation.
meanings.sent5: The downside of the coin had a different design than the top.
